edu.nd.darts.cimon
Class ValueNode<T extends Comparable<T>>

java.lang.Object
  edu.nd.darts.cimon.ValueNode<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
CurrentNode<T>
public class ValueNode<T extends Comparable<T>>
extends Object
implements CurrentNode<T>

Node which maintains triple-linked-list structure for an actively monitored metric. This node maintains the current value of the monitored metric, and a list of the active periodic and condition monitoring requests for this metric. Implements CurrentNode for metrics represented by Number.

Author:
darts
See Also:
CurrentNode

Constructor Detail

ValueNode

public ValueNode(int metric,
                 SparseArray<TimerNode> schedules,
                 Handler handler,
                 AdminObserver observer)
Node which maintains triple-linked-list structure for an actively monitored metric.

Parameters:
metric - integer representing metric to be monitored (as specified in Metrics)
schedules - schedule shared by all metrics in group to synchronize updates
handler - handler to thread used for database updates
observer - observer which should be notified of monitor status changes
Method Detail

minPeriod

private long minPeriod(long current)
Determine minimum period before next required update among the three linked-lists.

Parameters:
current - system time of current update
Returns:
time for next update (in milliseconds from current time), -1 if lists are empty

Returns:

                         ArrayList<DataEntry> data)
Schedules runnable which will insert batched data into database.

Parameters:
monitorId - ID of monitor batched data is collected for
data - array list of batched data (data, timestamp pairs)

Description copied from interface: CurrentNode
Remove condition monitor for threshold node registered with monitorId.

Specified by:
removeThresh in interface CurrentNode<T extends Comparable<T>>
Parameters:
monitorId - unique id of the conditional or event monitor
max - true if removal from max threshold list, false for min threshold list
Returns:
true if all monitoring lists for current node are empty after removal

insertThresh

public void insertThresh(int monitorId,
                         T threshold,
                         long period,
                         ExpressionNode enode,
                         boolean max)
Description copied from interface: CurrentNode
Insert new condition for specified threshold. If max is true, monitor as maximum threshold, otherwise monitor as minimum threshold.

Specified by:
insertThresh in interface CurrentNode<T extends Comparable<T>>
Parameters:
monitorId - unique id of monitor
threshold - threshold value to trigger if surpassed
period - required maximum period
enode - ExpressionNode which registered condition
max - set as minimum/maximum threshold

                        long period,
                        Messenger callback,
                        long duration)
Description copied from interface: CurrentNode
Insert periodic monitor to provide updated value at intervals of _period_.

Specified by:
insertTimed in interface CurrentNode<T extends Comparable<T>>
Parameters:
monitorId - unique id of monitor
period - period in milliseconds to provide updates
callback - messenger to handle callback with updated values
duration - duration to monitor, in milliseconds (0 for continuous)

insertOpportunistic

public void insertOpportunistic(int monitorId,
                                long maxperiod,
                                Messenger callback,
                                long duration)
Description copied from interface: CurrentNode
Insert opportunistic monitor (eavesdrop) to provide updated value whenever available, with maximum interval capped at _maxperiod_.

Specified by:
insertOpportunistic in interface CurrentNode<T extends Comparable<T>>
Parameters:
monitorId - unique id of monitor
maxperiod - maximum allowable period in milliseconds to provide updates
callback - messenger to handle callback with updated values
duration - duration to monitor, in milliseconds (0 for continuous)
